name: Western Pennsylvania Hospital et al. v. Lichliter et al., Appellant

judges: Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Patterson, JJ.
parties: Western Pennsylvania Hospital et al. v. Lichliter et al., Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed on the comprehensive opinion of Judge Richards. Costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Sidney G. Handler, with him Benjamin C. Sigal, for appellant.
John W. Kephart, with him H. G. Wasson, Seward H. French, Jr., Reed, Smith, Shaw & McOlay and George Ross Hull, for appellees.
J. Charles Short, Solicitor, M. Louise Rutherford and William M. Rutter, Deputy Attorneys General, and Claude T. Reno, Attorney General, for Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board, interested party.
casebody.head_matter:
Western Pennsylvania Hospital et al. v. Lichliter et al., Appellant.
Argued November 26, 1940.
Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Patterson, JJ.
Sidney G. Handler, with him Benjamin C. Sigal, for appellant.
John W. Kephart, with him H. G. Wasson, Seward H. French, Jr., Reed, Smith, Shaw & McOlay and George Ross Hull, for appellees.
J. Charles Short, Solicitor, M. Louise Rutherford and William M. Rutter, Deputy Attorneys General, and Claude T. Reno, Attorney General, for Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board, interested party.
January 6, 1941:
